text: HomeSense is a Canadian company that sells furniture and bedding. They are owned by TJX Companies. The company was first created in Canada by TJX Companies in 2001. The company also has stores in Europe and the United States. They first expanded into Europe in April 2008. The first store they opened was in Poole, England. On August 17, 2017, the first American HomeSense store was opened in Framingham, Massachusetts. Outside of Canada, the company's name is stylized as Homesense. == References == ==Other website== * Category:2001 establishments in Canada Category:Furniture retailers of Canada
title: HomeSense
